languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс чуть склоняет голову набок. Его глаза приобретают хорошо знакомое вам ледяное выражение.{/n} "Аколит Инквизиции сообщил об угрозе — достаточно значимой, чтобы раскрыть себя и свое местоположение. Мне напомнить о том, чем {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}может обернуться игнорирование{/d} подобных сведений?"

{n}Heinrix cocks his head slightly and his eyes take on the icy hardness already familiar to you.{/n} "An acolyte of the Inquisition has reported a threat — one significant enough to reveal herself and her position. Need I remind you what {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ignoring{/d} such a report could lead to?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс чуть склоняет голову набок. languages.text: {n}海因里希微微歪了歪头。他的眼神冰冷而果决，你已经很熟悉他这样的目光了。{/n}“审判庭的侍仆报告说发现了威胁，这个威胁可能会让她的身份暴露。需要我提醒你，{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}忽视{/d}这样的报告可能会招致怎样的后果吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cocks his head slightly and his eyes take on the icy hardness already familiar to you.{/n} "An acolyte of the Inquisition has reported a threat — one significant enough to reveal herself and her position. Need I remind you what {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ignoring{/d} such a report could lead to?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希微微歪了歪头。他的眼神冰冷而果决，你已经很熟悉他这样的目光了。{/n}“审判庭的侍仆报告说发现了威胁，这个威胁可能会让她的身份暴露。需要我提醒你，忽视这样的报告可能会招致怎样的后果吗？”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ladea ligeramente la cabeza y sus ojos adoptan la dureza helada que ya te resulta familiar.{/n} «Una acólita de la Inquisición ha informado de una amenaza; una tan significativa como para revelar su presencia y su ubicación. ¿Debo recordarle lo que podría ocurrir de {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ignorarla{/d}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cocks his head slightly and his eyes take on the icy hardness already familiar to you.{/n} "An acolyte of the Inquisition has reported a threat — one significant enough to reveal herself and her position. Need I remind you what {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ignoring{/d} such a report could lead to?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ladea ligeramente la cabeza y sus ojos adoptan la dureza helada que ya te resulta familiar.{/n} «Una acólita de la Inquisición ha informado de una amenaza; una tan significativa como para revelar su presencia y su ubicación. ¿Debo recordarle lo que podría ocurrir de ignorarla?».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは頭をわずかに下げ、その目は既におなじみの氷のような硬さを帯びている。{/n}「異端審問庁のアコライトが脅威を報告しました。それはその人物とその立場を明らかにするのに足るほど重大なものです。そのような報告を{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}無視{/d}すると何が起こるのかを、思い出させてさしあげる必要がありますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cocks his head slightly and his eyes take on the icy hardness already familiar to you.{/n} "An acolyte of the Inquisition has reported a threat — one significant enough to reveal herself and her position. Need I remind you what {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ignoring{/d} such a report could lead to?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは頭をわずかに下げ、その目は既におなじみの氷のような硬さを帯びている。{/n}「異端審問庁のアコライトが脅威を報告しました。それはその人物とその立場を明らかにするのに足るほど重大なものです。そのような報告を{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}無視{/d}すると何が起こるのかを、思い出させてさしあげる必要がありますか？」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix incline légèrement la tête sur le côté et ses yeux retrouvent l'éclat glacial que vous leur connaissez.{/n} « Une acolyte de l'Inquisition a signalé une menace, une menace si importante qu'elle l'a poussée à s'identifier et à révéler sa position. Dois-je vous rappeler ce qui pourrait advenir si vous décidiez d'{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ignorer{/d} un tel avertissement ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cocks his head slightly and his eyes take on the icy hardness already familiar to you.{/n} "An acolyte of the Inquisition has reported a threat — one significant enough to reveal herself and her position. Need I remind you what {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ignoring{/d} such a report could lead to?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix incline légèrement la tête sur le côté et ses yeux retrouvent l'éclat glacial que vous leur connaissez.{/n} « Une acolyte de l'Inquisition a signalé une menace, une menace si importante qu'elle l'a poussée à s'identifier et à révéler sa position. Dois-je vous rappeler ce qui pourrait advenir si vous décidiez d'ignorer un tel avertissement ? »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix neigt seinen Kopf leicht, und sein Blick strahlt jene eisige Härte aus, die du bereits kennst.{/n} "Eine Akolythin der Inquisition hat eine Bedrohung gemeldet – bedeutsam genug, um sich selbst und ihre Position zu offenbaren. Muss ich Euch daran erinnern, wozu es führen kann, so einen Bericht zu {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ignorieren{/d}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cocks his head slightly and his eyes take on the icy hardness already familiar to you.{/n} "An acolyte of the Inquisition has reported a threat — one significant enough to reveal herself and her position. Need I remind you what {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ignoring{/d} such a report could lead to?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix neigt seinen Kopf leicht, und sein Blick strahlt jene eisige Härte aus, die du bereits kennst.{/n} "Eine Akolythin der Inquisition hat eine Bedrohung gemeldet – bedeutsam genug, um sich selbst und ihre Position zu offenbaren. Muss ich Euch daran erinnern, wozu es führen kann, so einen Bericht zu ignorieren?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix başını hafifçe dikleştiriyor. Gözleri, o aşina olduğun buz gibi katılığa bürünüyor.{/n} "Bir Engizisyon havarisi bir tehdit rapor etti. Kendini ve konumunu açık etmesini gerektirecek kadar önemli bir tehdit. Böylesi bir raporu {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}yok saymanın{/d} nelere yol açabileceğini hatırlatmama gerek var mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix cocks his head slightly and his eyes take on the icy hardness already familiar to you.{/n} "An acolyte of the Inquisition has reported a threat — one significant enough to reveal herself and her position. Need I remind you what {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}ignoring{/d} such a report could lead to?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix başını hafifçe dikleştiriyor ve gözleri o aşina olduğun buz gibi katılığa bürünüyor.{/n} "Bir Engizisyon havarisi bir tehdit rapor etti. Kendini ve konumunu açık etmesini gerektirecek kadar önemli bir tehdit. Böylesi bir raporu {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}yok saymanın{/d} nelere yol açabileceğini sana hatırlatmama gerek var mı?"
